Twitter Facebook YouTube channel

UX Brighton is a volunteer community group. We run monthly meet ups as well as an annual conference.

This site is currently under development so we’d love it if youcould take a few minutes to send us feedback (via Github)

UX and Big Data

  • 12 August, 2014 at 7pm
  • The venue for this event will be announced soon.

The UX Brighton event for August will be looking at the challenges of designing for big data. Speaker lineup and venue will be announced soon.

Ergonomics

  • 14 October, 2014 at 7pm
  • The venue for this event will be announced soon.

October's UX Brighton brings you an evening of talks on ergonomics. Check back for speaker details and tickets.

UX Brighton 2014 Conference

  • 14 November, 2014 at
  • The venue for this event will be announced soon.

The 2014 UX Brighton conference will take place in the 14th of November.

For more details visit the 2014 conference homepage
